metadata.name: King of Boredom
metadata.description:
King of Boredom is a 1/1 toy. 

Benefit of first buyer — A limited edition real copy of “King of Boredom”


Boredom is the most important emotion of all, a time when we can recharge our energy, reflect, mature. Boredom is big, it feeds on the stupor of the insigificant and has the eyes of impassivity
